name: I Know Pop Rock Brazil
description:
SIMPLE, FAST & FUN
* Challenge your friends
* Be ranked first between your friends
* Guess the artist or song
* Become a true music master!

GREAT HITS OF ROCK AND POP
* Collections of decades 2000s, 90s, 80s and more!
* New music & artists added mounthly

PLEASE NOTE
* This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
* Advertising appears in this game.


So what are you waiting for? Let’s go! Download the game!
